19 #define GANDIVA_SELECTION_VECTOR_IMP_H

30 
31 namespace gandiva {
32 
35 template <typename C_TYPE, typename A_TYPE>
36 class SelectionVectorImpl : public SelectionVector {
37  public:
38  SelectionVectorImpl(int max_slots, std::shared_ptr<arrow::Buffer> buffer)
39  : max_slots_(max_slots), num_slots_(0), buffer_(buffer) {
40  raw_data_ = reinterpret_cast<C_TYPE*>(buffer->mutable_data());
41  }
42 
43  uint GetIndex(int index) const override {
44  DCHECK_LE(index, max_slots_);
45  return raw_data_[index];
46  }
47 
48  void SetIndex(int index, uint value) override {
49  DCHECK_LE(index, max_slots_);
50  DCHECK_LE(value, GetMaxSupportedValue());
51 
52  raw_data_[index] = static_cast<C_TYPE>(value);
53  }
54 
55  ArrayPtr ToArray() const override;
56 
57  int GetMaxSlots() const override { return max_slots_; }
58 
59  int GetNumSlots() const override { return num_slots_; }
60 
61  void SetNumSlots(int num_slots) override {
62  DCHECK_LE(num_slots, max_slots_);
63  num_slots_ = num_slots;
64  }
65 
66  uint GetMaxSupportedValue() const override {
67  return std::numeric_limits<C_TYPE>::max();
68  }
69 
70  static Status AllocateBuffer(int max_slots, arrow::MemoryPool* pool,
71  std::shared_ptr<arrow::Buffer>* buffer);
72 
73  static Status ValidateBuffer(int max_slots, std::shared_ptr<arrow::Buffer> buffer);
74 
75  protected:
77  int max_slots_;
78 
80  int num_slots_;
81 
82  std::shared_ptr<arrow::Buffer> buffer_;
83  C_TYPE* raw_data_;
84 };
85 
86 template <typename C_TYPE, typename A_TYPE>
87 ArrayPtr SelectionVectorImpl<C_TYPE, A_TYPE>::ToArray() const {
88  auto data_type = arrow::TypeTraits<A_TYPE>::type_singleton();
89  auto array_data = arrow::ArrayData::Make(data_type, num_slots_, {NULLPTR, buffer_});
90  return arrow::MakeArray(array_data);
91 }
92 
93 using SelectionVectorInt16 = SelectionVectorImpl<uint16_t, arrow::UInt16Type>;
94 using SelectionVectorInt32 = SelectionVectorImpl<uint32_t, arrow::UInt32Type>;
95 
96 } // namespace gandiva
